description: Consider implementing token binding strategies, such as Azure AD token protection or OAuth Proof of Possession, that cryptographically bind a token to a secret. This may prevent the token from being used without knowledge of the secret or possession of the device the token is tied to.(Citation: Microsoft Token Protection 2023)(Citation: Okta DPoP 2023)
